tool_description: RChilli resume parser is a deep learning/AI framework that identifies complete information from resumes and enriches it through its taxonomies. It extracts candidate data from resumes in 140+ data fields like Contact Information, Personal Information, Education, Experience, and Skills, etc. through REST API.
name: RChilli Resume Parser
title: RChilli Resume Parser

api_list.name: Resume Parser Url API
api_list.description: Resume Parser Url API allows you to parse resume using resume public URL.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rchilli-resume-parser1.p.rapidapi.com/parseResume"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rchilli-resume-parser1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Resume Parser Binary API
api_list.description: Resume Parser Binary API allows you to parse the resume using binary data in base64 format.
